channel.title: My return
channel.description:
I'm glad to say. Today i took my I.T GCSE and in my mind passed with flying colours :) In light of this event i will be returning to the forums for a certain time until my next GCSE is on the way ;) I'm so glad. As I.T is one of the GCSE's i need for my job :) Yet i am returning. But not as much to general sections. I am going to make myself dedicated to just the Graphics section :) I wasn't gone long. But maybe next time i will. Once again thanks for the support.
Please don't post if you're going to flame me.

item.title: My return
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

[quote=“FastBallz, post:20, topic:17921”][quote author=coatbridge link=topic=26841.msg307395#msg307395 date=1160623399]
Hi bicmac welcome back

Alright I am in no way flaming you or anything(seriously I am not), just a little observation. But holy cow, how did you get so much rep? I know you helped out a lot with graphics and stuff. Does any body else find it strange how bigmac has 51 rep, but even the most respected members of this forum have less then 20?
[/quote]

When he came back he had 46 (Today)…Rofl…[/quote]

Welcome back Bigmac. I find it kind of strange, but, oh well.

Read full topic

@whothe0 wrote:

[quote=“ilyaostr9, post:12, topic:17921”][quote author=bigmac link=topic=26841.msg306770#msg306770 date=1160600241]
I’m glad to say. Today i took my I.T GCSE and in my mind passed with flying colours
In light of this event i will be returning to the forums for a certain time until my next GCSE is on the way
I’m so glad. As I.T is one of the GCSE’s i need for my job
Yet i am returning. But not as much to general sections.
I am going to make myself dedicated to just the Graphics section
I wasn’t gone long. But maybe next time i will.
Once again thanks for the support.

Please don’t post if you’re going to flame me.
[/quote]
Hey dude, apply for Community Member you got 50 rep!

Oh and, welcome back!!![/quote]

51
